text:
Hi I'd really like to help out but o don't understand what you are trying to do. 

Is it possible to create an app that you get HubSpot contact info and do something with that info? Yea. 

Search for “HubSpot app development” and there are quite a few resources out there. 

If you have a specific question that you can provide some more context to, I can try to help
Send the after through on the next call. Think of it as an offset
You would need to create multiple filter groups. There are only theee filters per group, but you can add multiple groups
How do you site search on the sub domain? I tried adding a parameter '&domain' but still includes the main domain. Any idea to return results from sub domain only?

i want to create HubSpot app for my website and allow to all users that each user can move contact from HubSpot to website and website to HubSpot.
now understand ?
how to get uploaded file in form-uploads through api,
